title: Understanding Jealous Delusions
text: Jealous delusions are a type of delusional disorder where the individual is convinced of their partner's infidelity without any substantial evidence.

title: Characteristics of Jealous Delusions
text: These delusions often involve intense emotions and can lead to significant distress or conflict in relationships.

hintAnswer: when the individual believes their partner or spouse is cheating on them or will cheat despite evidence to the contrary
